meta_description.title: Panzer Dragoon - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Panzer Dragoon Saga (1998) — Panzer Dragoon Saga (titled Azel: Panzer Dragoon RPG in Japan) is a role-playing game (RPG) released for Saturn in 1998.

people_also_ask.question: Is Panzer Dragoon Saga hard?
people_also_ask.heading: Panzer Dragoon is a difficult game. For such a linear experience, the team worried that people would have little incentive to replay it once they beat it. So they made the game difficult as a way to extend its duration. Many players complained that the game was too difficult.22-Mar-2019

people_also_ask.question: How many Panzer Dragoon games are there?
people_also_ask.heading: There are three primary games in the Panzer Dragoon series -- the original, Zwei, and Orta. Panzer Dragoon Saga, also known as Panzer Dragoon RPG: Azel in Japan, is a unique role-playing game that takes the shooter mechanics of the other installments and brilliany weaves them into a deeply strategic battle system.
